title: Rads Error
body: When i recently wanted to login into league of legends, the client said that i was offline. I checked my internet and it was running just fine. I tried to restart my computer and re log but it still did not work. I then decided to reinstall the game. When i tried to reinstall the game it did not work. Rads error kept popping up once i needed to patch. I downloaded the installed just fine but after it installed, rads error appears. Ive tried lowering my firewall and changing the dns. It still did not work. Can anyone help and is this helping with anyone else.

replies.body: The exact same thing has been happening to me for the past 3 days... Broporo finally told me to update my OS permissions (didnt work) and i replied to him and told him it didnt work so maybe ill get more help soon... {{champion:32}}

Most of the time those RADS errors mean that your OS is blocking the launcher from connecting to our servers. Let's run through and update your OS [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quick, and hit me back up if that doesn't help!
i literally did the exact same thing and went through every troubleshooting thread on the net rioter pls send help
